channel.title: Novice Java Programmer Needs Help with Fresh New Server
channel.description: Hello, I am new and just finished the forum quiz on the first try. I'm pretty experienced with C++ and a bit with Java. I downloaded Moparscape w/ Aryan and have started my own server under the IP, khunter9scape.servegame.com ...People are able to connect to and play on my server freely, but my server is somewhat "dull". Nothing special compared to most other servers. I would like to personalize my server with various shops and guards and Welcome screen. I have no idea how to do those things. I only know how to spawn npc's and item's. Can someone walk me through the steps?

item.title: Novice Java Programmer Needs Help with Fresh New Server
item.dc:creator: @def_job def job
item.description:
@def_job wrote:

have a look in the tut section.

Read full topic
item.source: Novice Java Programmer Needs Help with Fresh New Server
